text: nim'mannu tīrā durbala sthitiyalli sr̥ṣṭisidavanu mattu ā baḷika daurbalyada sthitiyinda nim'mannu śaktiśāli sthitige oydavanu mattu śaktiśāli sthitiyinda nim'mannu punaḥ daurbalyada hāgū vr̥d'dhāpyada sthitige oyyuvavanu allāhanē. Avanu tānicchisiddannu sr̥ṣṭisuttāne. Avanu ellavannū ballavanu mattu śaktanāgiddāne
